public int firstOccurrenceOfMadHatter()
Finds where the string "Mad Hatter" occurs for the first time in the book.

Returns:

getFirstSentence

public java.lang.String getFirstSentence()
Gets the first sentence of this book.

Returns:

Calculates the number of characters (as in letters and symbols, not people) in the book.

readBook

public void readBook(java.lang.String fileName)
A method to help read the book out of the file. You don't have to read this unless you want to. the "try" and "catch" are java's way of dealing with runtime errors or "exceptions".
